snippet.title: Exclusive: 10 Minutes of CELESTE Gameplay — TOWERFALL Creators' Next Game!
snippet.description:
Nick Robinson checks out 10 minutes of hands-on gameplay from CELESTE, the new single-player platformer from the creators of Towerfall coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam in 2017.
Subscribe: https://goo.gl/qw3Ac7

Check out our full video catalog: https://goo.gl/Cqt2cn
